l2c3qu4js5rdbxuptoazk.title: Newton's laws of motion
l2c3qu4js5rdbxuptoazk.subject: physics
l2c3qu4js5rdbxuptoazk.description: This lesson should cover Newton's laws of motion. Teach as if the student is learning about it for the first time.

learningObjectives.title: Understand and apply Newton's first law of motion

images.description: an image of an aeroplane with arrows showing the forces acting upon it
an image of a person pushing a large ball

learningObjectives.title: Understand and apply Newton's second law of motion

images.description: an image of a person pushing a box and the formula "f=ma"

learningObjectives.title: Understand and apply Newton's third law of motion

images.description: an image of a person pushing against a wall with arrows showing the forces in each direction

learningObjectives.title: Understand the key ideas of algebra

learningObjectives.title: Be able to solve more difficult algebraic expressions
